medicines.name: Lisinopril

adult.post_heart_attack: 5 mg within 24 hours, 5 mg after 24 hours

elderly.notes: Lower doses recommended due to reduced kidney function

warnings: Monitor kidney function and potassium levels
May cause birth defects if used during pregnancy

medicines.name: Metoprolol

adult.hypertension: 25-100 mg daily in single or divided doses
adult.heart_failure: Start at 25 mg daily, increase gradually

elderly.notes: Adjust based on response and tolerance

warnings: Avoid in severe peripheral vascular disease

medicines.name: Amlodipine
warnings: May worsen angina when starting/increasing dose

medicines.name: Warfarin
uses: Prevention of stroke in atrial fibrillation

adult.notes: Dose adjusted based on INR monitoring

contraindications: Recent brain, eye, or spinal cord surgery
warnings: Avoid activities with high risk of injury

adult.notes: Take in morning to avoid nighttime urination

elderly.notes: Monitor fluid and electrolyte status closely

medicines.name: Tizanidine
contraindications: Use with Cipro or other CYP1A2 inhibitors

medicines.name: Montelukast
uses: Prophylaxis and chronic treatment of asthma

medicines.name: Aspirin
uses: Blood thinner (prevents heart attacks and strokes)

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
uses: Treats bacterial infections (ear infections, throat infections, pneumonia)

medicines.name: Metformin
uses: Treats type 2 diabetes (lowers blood sugar levels)

medicines.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
uses: Diuretic (treats high blood pressure, fluid retention)

medicines.name: Furosemide
uses: Diuretic (fluid retention, heart failure, kidney problems)

medicines.name: Ciprofloxacin
uses: Treats bacterial infections (urinary tract, respiratory, and more)
